original_text: But if a widow has children or grandchildren, these should learn first of all to put their religion into practice by caring for their own family and so repaying their parents and grandparents, for this is pleasing to God.
korean_text: 만일 어떤 과부에게 자녀나 손자들이 있거든 그들로 먼저 자기 집에서 효를 행하여 부모에게 보답하기를 배우게 하라 이것이 하나님 앞에 받으실 만한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But if a widow has children or grandchildren
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 과부에게 자녀나 손주가 있다면

sentences.original_text: these should learn first of all
to put their religion into practice
by caring for their own family
and so repaying their parents and grandparents
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그렇게 자기 부모와 조부모에게 갚는 것을

sentences.original_text: for this is pleasing to God
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 하나님을 기쁘시게 하는 것이기 때문입니다
